channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WPGraphQL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WPGraphQL

item.title: CVE-2019-25060|2024-08-05T03:00:19.088Z -- unknown -- wpgraphql
item.description: The WPGraphQL WordPress plugin before 0.3.5 doesn't properly restrict access to information about other users' roles on the affected site. Because of this, a remote attacker could forge a GraphQL query to retrieve the account roles of every user on the site.
